articles.title: Fortnite's Dragon Ball event lets you live out your dreams of being a Super Saiyan - The Verge
articles.description: Fortnite’s new Dragon Ball event lets me feel like I’m actually a Super Saiyan. As Goku, I ran around the Fortnite island, firing Kamehameha beams and flying on the Nimbus Cloud.
articles.content:
Ill never be able to charge up energy like this in real life, but I can in Fortnite.

articles.title: ‘More zeros than I’ve seen in my life’: the author who got a six-figure deal via ‘BookTok’ - The Guardian
